review: My child had a major injury in his leg. Dr. Shishir Kumar is very cooperative and friendly, also well experienced and qualified in his field. I am fully satisfied with the treatment.

I will never recommend and share to my friend and my family to take treatment from Dr. Shishir Because of his misbehave and way of his talking. He is not helpful and no friendly to patients. Then Dr. Shishir will not entertain.  My first experience was very bad.
